release.description: This release of the Registry Tools is a component of the integrated release 8.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added the test-extrinsics.py script providing examples for manipulating extrinsics.
Added the report-extrinsics.py script to list counts of extrinsic types.
Updated the list-extrinsics.py script to allow optional arguments.

release.description: This release of the Registry Tools is a component of the integrated release 7.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Registry Tools is a component of the integrated release 7.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Updated Windows System Properties Install Guide.
Created the Registry Tools component with the List Extrinsics software as the first entry.
